about_the_game:
Madness^3 Original Sountrack features tunes you heard while play!

MP3 files are placed in the following directory:
[STEAM INSTALL DIRECTORY]/steamapps/common/Madness Cubed/OST/

Tracklist:
1. Sleepwalking
2. Spes Omnium
3. Survivors
4. Time_of Madness
5. Theme

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3200+ / Intel Pentium 4 3200+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or compatible
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X2 255 / Intel Pentium E5500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3850 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
